questions.question: Ubani owaqala i-ANC?

questions.question: Ke eng leina la IUPAC la CH₃CH(CH₃)CH₂CH₃?
questions.explanation: Molekule ye e na le ketane e telele ya dikhabone tše nne (butane) ka sehlopha sa methyl (CH₃) go khabone ya bobedi.

subject: Geography
topic: Tikoloho le Phetoho ya Boemo ba Leholimo

questions.passage: Ho na le leqhubu le matla la mocheso Afrika Borwa nakong ea lehlabula. Sena se ama temo hampe le bophelo ba batho.

questions.question: Leqhubu la mocheso le ama eng haholo?
questions.explanation: Khatiso e bolela hore leqhubu la mocheso le ama temo le bophelo ba batho.

questions.question: Ke nakong efe ea selemo moo leqhubu lena le hlahang?
questions.explanation: Khatiso e bolela hore leqhubu la mocheso le hlaha nakong ea lehlabula.
